data.title: Arlene Alda
data.meta_description: Arlene Alda. Camera and Electrical Department: Vier Jahreszeiten. Arlene Alda was born on 12 March 1933 in Bronx, New York, USA. She is a producer, known for Vier Jahreszeiten (1981), Shooting an Elephant (2016) and Punky Brewster (1984). She has been married to Alan Alda since 15 March 1957. They have three children.
data.text: Is of Jewish heritage, but agreed to a Catholic wedding to please her then-devout husband, Alan Alda. In order to do so, she took instructions in the Catholic faith that are required by the Catholic Church for all non-Catholics that marry into the Church and desire a Catholic wedding. Her husband has since left the Church.
